subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Titans’ Pacman Jones was suspended for the entire 2007 N.F.L. season and the Bengals’ Chris Henry was suspended for the first eight games for violating the leagues personal conduct policy.
snippet: The Titans’ Pacman Jones was suspended for the entire 2007 N.F.L. season and the Bengals’ Chris Henry was suspended for the first eight games for violating the leagues personal conduct policy.
